attributes.action: Congratulate the British for the success of Slumdog at the Oscars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is perhaphs more of Danny Boyle than Dev Patel which made Slumdog a success. We are not alarmed by the poverty shown in Slumdog, because poor people do go to vote at the polls. Instead we would like you to recognize that we are spending 1.7 billion for a manned mission to space. A british documentary portraying our scientific success is more in order.

rejection.details: You have to be a UK citizen to create a petition.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
